me athara shri lankawa sambandhayen unanduwak dakwana eemenma jiniwahi balapamak sahitha pramukha anthar jathika siwil sanwidhana gananawak maha komasaris michel bachalet aamanthranaya karana prakashayak magin mese kiya sitiye ya: ‘mema sasiwarayedi 30/1 darana kawunsilaye yojanawa kriyathmatha kirimehila shri lankanduwa dakwa athi pragathiya saha ithiriwa athi boho abhiyogayan arabhaya sawistharathmaka warthawak maha komasariswariya wisin idiripath karanawa atha. 30/1 yojanawata sama dayakathwaya sapayima magin shri lankawa manawa himikam kawunsilayata da erata janathawatada dena lada porondu sampurnayenma itu karana thuru kawunsilaya ema kriyadamaya samanga samasthayak lesama badi katayuthu kirima athayawashya ya.
oya hithana widiyata meka nikanma nikan biskat bag ekak witharak nemeyi meke miliyana 1.5 kma thiyenawa

nuwaraeliya disthrikkaye kothmale polis wasame grama sewa wasam 05k ada (21) aluyama sita hudekala kirimata thiranaya kara thibenawa.ee anuwa kothmale polis balapradeshaye kaludamada, hapugasthalawa, wirapura, beramana dakuna saha pahala gorakaoya yana grama sewa wasam melesa hudekala kala grama sewa wasam wanawa.me athara disthrikka 12ka thawath grama sewa wasam 24k ada (21) udasana hathare sita hudakala kala athara disthrikka 12ka grama sewa wasam 82k hudekala bawin nidahaskarana bawa yuda hamudapathi jenaral shawendra silwa eeye (20) sandahan kala.
